channel.title: Crashing whenever talking to npc
channel.description: [s][s][s][s]Im sorry, theres not much else to say but evertime i talk to one of them i get this error in cmd. chillscape client V2.00 - Developed by chillscape Staff Team. Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 2352 2183 1056 80 Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 3 at Class36.method531(Class36.java:114) at Model.method470(Model.java:1242) at RSInterface.method209(RSInterface.java:3633) at client.drawInterface(client.java:9440) at client.drawChatArea(client.java:533) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9039) at client.processDrawing(client.java:9829) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:5583) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . . Thank You in advance[/s][/s][/s][/s] Figured it out was a problem in the cache, thanks anyways.

item.title: Crashing whenever talking to npc
item.dc:creator: @JavaLearner JavaLearner
item.description:
@JavaLearner wrote:

Posting the lines that come with the error will be a great help.

Read full topic

item.title: Crashing whenever talking to npc
item.dc:creator: @eboone1234 eboone1234
item.description:
@eboone1234 wrote:

Im sorry, theres not much else to say but evertime i talk to one of them i get this error in cmd.
chillscape client V2.00 - Developed by chillscape Staff Team.
Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36
2352
2183
1056
80
Exception in thread “Thread-5” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 3
at Class36.method531(Class36.java:114)
at Model.method470(Model.java:1242)
at RSInterface.method209(RSInterface.java:3633)
at client.drawInterface(client.java:9440)
at client.drawChatArea(client.java:533)
at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9039)
at client.processDrawing(client.java:9829)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108)
at client.run(client.java:5583)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Press any key to continue . . .
Thank You in advance
Figured it out was a problem in the cache, thanks anyways.

Read full topic
